methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns a list of all the variables in the current session.

schema.name: variable_list
schema.description: A view containing a list of variables in the session.

variables.description: A list of variables in the session.

length.description: The total number of variables in the session. This may be greater than the number of variables in the 'variables' array if the array is truncated.

version.description: The version of the view (incremented with each update)

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears (deletes) all variables in the current session.

params.name: include_hidden_objects
params.description: Whether to clear hidden objects in addition to normal variables

methods.name: delete
methods.summary: Deletes a set of named variables
methods.description: Deletes the named variables from the current session.

params.name: names
params.description: The names of the variables to delete.

schema.description: The names of the variables that were successfully deleted.

methods.name: inspect
methods.description: Returns the children of a variable, as an array of variables.

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the variable to inspect, as an array of access keys.

children.description: The children of the inspected variable.

length.description: The total number of children. This may be greater than the number of children in the 'children' array if the array is truncated.

methods.name: clipboard_format
methods.description: Requests a formatted representation of a variable for copying to the clipboard.

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the variable to format, as an array of access keys.

params.name: format
params.description: The requested format for the variable, as a MIME type

schema.name: formatted_variable
schema.description: An object formatted for copying to the clipboard.

content.description: The formatted content of the variable.

methods.name: view
methods.summary: Request a viewer for a variable
methods.description: Request that the runtime open a data viewer to display the data in a variable.

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the variable to view, as an array of access keys.

variable.name: variable
variable.description: A single variable in the runtime.

access_key.description: A key that uniquely identifies the variable within the runtime and can be used to access the variable in `inspect` requests

display_name.description: The name of the variable, formatted for display

display_value.description: A string representation of the variable's value, formatted for display and possibly truncated

display_type.description: The variable's type, formatted for display

type_info.description: Extended information about the variable's type

size.description: The size of the variable's value in bytes

kind.description: The kind of value the variable represents, such as 'string' or 'number'

length.description: The number of elements in the variable, if it is a collection

has_children.description: Whether the variable has child variables

has_viewer.description: True if there is a viewer available for this variable (i.e. the runtime can handle a 'view' request for this variable)

is_truncated.description: True if the 'value' field is a truncated representation of the variable's value
